bibl.title: Early Christian Ruins at Kom al-Namrud.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: Remains of an early Christian group of monks' dwellings, excavated by the Egyptian Antiquities Organization, 1984. - 1. The upper church (2nd half of the VIIth cent.). - 2. The earlier church. - 3. The house to the north (before the middle of the VIIth cent.).
FARID FATHY Samy and Peter GROSSMANN, Early Christian Ruins at Kom al-Namrud.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 33 (1994) pp. 69-78, 3 figg. et pll. VIII-IX.
